title: Mickey Rooney | Quicksand (Film-Noir, 1950) by Irving Pichel | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Mickey Rooney | Quicksand (Film-Noir, 1950) by Irving Pichel | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
Mickey Rooney plunges into the gripping noir, 'Quicksand,' where love and crime entwine in a desperate descent.
Auto mechanic Dan Brady's troubles began when he borrowed $20 for a date, leading to a chain of crimes: pawning watches, blackmail, and a failed escape plan. In this suspenseful story, decisions lead to trouble, and love becomes the only hope in a dark world of betrayal.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/0ruH-nqql70


Origin title: Quicksand (1950)
This film is subtitled in many language options.

Director: Irving Pichel
Writer: Robert Smith 
Stars: Mickey Rooney, Jeanne Cagney, Barbara Bates & Peter Lorre
Genre: Colorized Classics, Drama, Crime, Mystery, Film Noir, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
07:17 A summary of the film 'Quicksand' featuring Mickey Rooney, where a series of events unfold after a chance encounter with a stranger.
16:57 A man gets into trouble after buying a watch and pawning it, facing legal consequences for theft.
23:52 Dan struggles with debt and temptation, leading to a series of events involving money, a bar, and a woman.
32:14 Dan gets entangled in a criminal scheme after finding a large sum of money, leading to a series of dangerous events.
39:23: Getting caught in a dangerous situation after stealing a car and needs to come up with $3000 to avoid trouble.
49:10 Trouble after stealing money and facing the consequences.
59:46 A woman gets entangled in a criminal scheme after her boyfriend steals money, leading to a series of events involving robbery, murder, and betrayal.
1:03:10 Danny gets involved in a crime and seeks help from a woman named Helen to escape the police and flee to Mexico.
1:08:25 Dan confesses to a friend about a series of events involving a girl, a criminal act, and a possible murder. They plan to escape to Mexico, but Dan decides to turn himself in.
1:13:38 A series of events unfold as police officers are killed and a suspect is on the loose, leading to a dramatic chase and a confession.
